files.summary: Business logic class for quiz assignment management. Handles view initialization, populating dropdowns (passing baseline, completion time), creating/editing/deleting quiz assignments, managing preceptor assignments, validating assignment data, and exporting assignment details to CSV.
files.businessPurpose: Orchestrates the quiz assignment workflow including creating new quiz assignments with user selections, time limits, and passing criteria. Manages the lifecycle of quiz assignments from creation through completion.
keyMethods: onViewIntialize(page) - Initializes the assignment creation page with dropdown data
SaveAssignment(page) - Saves a new quiz assignment with all selected parameters
GetOnCallQuizAssignment(page) - Handles on-call quiz assignment creation
ExportQuizAssignmentToCSV(page) - Exports assignment details to CSV
files.migrationNote: Quiz assignment creation and management is a core workflow. Heavy use of WebForms Page object for UI manipulation makes this tightly coupled to .NET UI layer.

files.summary: Large data entity class with extensive properties for quiz assignment configuration including assignment ID, quiz ID, dates, user lists, completion time, passing percentage, status flags, preceptor settings, quiz sharing options, and milestone review configuration.
files.businessPurpose: Central data transfer object for quiz assignment configuration, carrying all parameters needed to create, update, and display quiz assignments.
files.migrationNote: This DTO maps to the quiz assignment database schema and would need equivalent TypeScript interfaces in Node.js.

files.summary: Data access manager for quiz assignment operations. Handles CRUD for quiz assignments, question management, quiz templates, specialty/topic management, quiz sharing, import/export of questions from Excel, and quiz completion tracking via numerous stored procedures.
files.businessPurpose: Primary data access layer for quiz assignment management, providing methods to create, read, update, and delete quiz assignments, questions, templates, specialties, and topics.
keyMethods: SaveQuizAssignmentDetails(info) - Saves quiz assignment to database
ImportQuestionsFromExcel(dt, quizId) - Imports quiz questions from Excel
CopyQuizTemplate(quizId, deptId) - Copies a quiz template
files.migrationNote: Core data access for quiz assignments with many stored procedure dependencies. Would map to MikroORM repositories in Node.js.

files.summary: Manager for quiz assignment user operations including fetching passing baselines, user assignments, quiz access logs, user details, and scheduler job history. Also handles quiz time tracking and reminder assignments.
files.businessPurpose: Manages the relationship between users and quiz assignments, tracking who is assigned to which quiz, their completion status, access history, and remaining time.
keyMethods: AddAssignmentUsersDetails(info) - Assigns users to a quiz
GetQuizAssignmentAccessUsersLog(info) - Gets user access log for audit
InsertSchedulerJobHistory(jobName, start, end, data) - Logs scheduler execution
files.migrationNote: User-quiz assignment tracking is critical for the quiz module migration.

files.summary: Manager class for department-related quiz operations including fetching department lists, rotation details, user types, PGY levels, and admin/preceptor information using stored procedures.
files.businessPurpose: Provides department-scoped data retrieval for quiz configuration, ensuring quizzes are properly scoped to departments, rotations, and user types.
keyMethods: GetDepartmentRotationDetails(deptId) - Gets rotations for a department
GetUserTypeDetails(deptId) - Gets user types for a department
GetAdminUsers(deptId) - Gets admin users for a department
files.migrationNote: Department data retrieval is shared infrastructure across modules.

files.summary: Data entity representing department rotation details with rotation ID, name, and specialty name properties using traditional get/set pattern.
files.businessPurpose: DTO for department rotation information used in quiz assignment filtering.
files.migrationNote: Simple DTO, maps to TypeScript interface.

files.summary: Large manager class for quiz template design and question management. Handles CRUD for quiz questions, answer options, specialties, topics, question activation/deactivation, template publishing, and quiz information retrieval via extensive stored procedure usage.
files.businessPurpose: Manages the design and configuration of quiz templates including creating questions, managing answer options, organizing by specialty/topic, and controlling question active/deleted status for the quiz builder interface.
keyMethods: GetQuizAllQuestions(quizId) - Gets all questions for a quiz
GetQuestionsDetails(questionId) - Gets question details for editing
files.migrationNote: Quiz template design is a complex feature that would need full reimplementation in Node.js.

files.summary: Simple data entity with ToEmail and Body properties for quiz-related email notifications.
files.businessPurpose: DTO for sending quiz notification emails.
files.migrationNote: Simple email DTO.

files.summary: Manager for retrieving quiz details, submission results, completed quiz information, and quiz status. Handles quiz attempt tracking, time management, voluntary quiz enrollment, and quiz redirect configuration after submission.
files.businessPurpose: Provides data retrieval for quiz taking and review workflows, including loading quiz questions during test-taking, tracking completion status, managing quiz time limits, and handling post-submission redirects.
keyMethods: GetQuizQuestions(quizId) - Gets questions for active quiz session
GetCompletedQuizInfo(userId, assignmentId) - Gets completed quiz details
UpdateQuizRemainingTime(info) - Updates remaining time for timed quizzes
files.migrationNote: Core quiz-taking engine data access. Critical for migration.

files.summary: Extensive data access manager for quiz reporting. Provides methods for generating various statistical reports including mean/median/range, high/low scores, frequency distributions, coefficient alpha, standard deviation, point-biserial correlation, item analysis, and no-of-respondents tabulations, all filterable by users or user types.
files.businessPurpose: Powers the quiz analytics and reporting dashboard with statistical analysis of quiz performance across users, user types, departments, and individual questions.
files.migrationNote: Complex statistical reporting with many stored procedures. Would require significant analytics reimplementation.

files.summary: Utility class with static methods to retrieve user lists for quiz assignment. Fetches users by FPGY (Fellow PGY) year list or MSY (Medical Student Year) list using the Security module's UserManager.
files.businessPurpose: Provides filtered user lists for selecting quiz assignment recipients based on training year level.
keyMethods: GetUsersByFPGYList(criteria) - Gets fellows by PGY year
GetStudentsByMSYList(criteria) - Gets medical students by year
files.migrationNote: User filtering logic depends on Security module.

files.summary: Static class providing a method to generate group listings of quiz users, formatting user names from DataTable results into ListItem collections.
files.businessPurpose: Supports grouping of quiz assignment users for batch operations.
files.migrationNote: Simple user grouping utility.

files.summary: Business logic for on-call integrated quiz assignments. Handles saving on-call quiz assignments linked to specific rotations, sending notification emails to assigned users, and managing the relationship between on-call schedules and quizzes.
files.businessPurpose: Manages quiz assignments triggered by on-call schedules, automatically assigning quizzes to residents when they are on specific rotations and sending email notifications.
files.migrationNote: On-call quiz integration is a specialized workflow.

files.summary: Very large business logic class for the quiz assignment management page. Handles view initialization, grid binding with Obout Grid controls, quiz assignment filtering, user assignment management, email notifications for new/reminder/failed assignments, quiz deletion, closing assignments, and audit trail display.
files.businessPurpose: Powers the main quiz assignment management interface, providing full lifecycle management of quiz assignments including creation, monitoring, reminders, closures, deletions, and reporting for administrators.
keyMethods: BindGridQuizAssignment(page) - Binds assignment grid with filtering
files.migrationNote: Core quiz administration interface. Heavy WebForms coupling with Obout Grid requires complete UI reimplementation.

files.summary: Data entity for preceptor information with preceptor ID, name, and user ID properties using traditional get/set pattern.
files.businessPurpose: DTO for preceptor details used in quiz assignment workflows where preceptors oversee trainee quiz assignments.
files.migrationNote: Simple DTO.

files.summary: Assembly metadata for the Quiz business library.
files.businessPurpose: .NET assembly configuration metadata.
files.migrationNote: .NET-specific metadata.

files.summary: Auto-generated settings class with a FileUploadComponent web reference URL setting.
files.businessPurpose: Configuration for the file upload web service reference.
files.migrationNote: Auto-generated .NET settings.

files.summary: Large data entity class with extensive properties for quiz question details including question text, options (A-F), correct answer, specialty, topic, explanation, linked video, active status, difficulty level, and various filter criteria.
files.businessPurpose: Comprehensive DTO for quiz question data used in question management, quiz design, and reporting interfaces.
files.migrationNote: Maps to quiz question database schema.

files.summary: Data entity for quiz assignment user log entries tracking quiz attempt details including user ID, quiz ID, assignment ID, scores, attempts, time spent, and completion timestamps.
files.businessPurpose: Tracks individual user quiz attempt history for audit and reporting purposes.
files.migrationNote: Audit log DTO for quiz attempts.

files.summary: Massive business logic class for the quiz-taking experience and quiz template design. Handles quiz display, question rendering, answer submission, timer management, result display, quiz review, template creation/editing, question import from Excel, specialty/topic management, and quiz sharing between departments.
files.businessPurpose: Core class powering both the quiz-taking UI (student experience) and quiz template design UI (admin experience). Manages the entire quiz lifecycle from template creation through student completion and review.
keyMethods: onViewIntialize(page) - Initializes quiz-taking or design page
DisplayQuestion(page) - Renders current question with options
SaveAnswer(page) - Saves student's answer to current question
SubmitQuiz(page) - Submits completed quiz for grading
ReviewQuiz(page) - Displays quiz review with correct answers
ShareQuiz(page) - Shares quiz template with other departments
files.migrationNote: The largest and most complex quiz class. Heavy WebForms coupling. Would need complete rewrite for React frontend and Node.js backend.

files.summary: Simple static class with a single method to fetch the list of quizzes for a department using the GetQuizList stored procedure.
files.businessPurpose: Provides quiz listing data for dropdown population and quiz selection interfaces.
files.migrationNote: Simple data retrieval, easily replicated.

files.summary: Very large business logic class for quiz reporting. Handles report generation including mean/median/range charts, high/low score analysis, frequency distribution, coefficient alpha (reliability), standard deviation, item analysis, respondent tabulations, point-biserial correlation, detailed assignment results, comparative reports, grade reports, and CSV exports for all report types.
files.businessPurpose: Powers the comprehensive quiz analytics dashboard, providing statistical analysis, visual charts (FusionCharts), data grids (Obout), and CSV export capabilities for all quiz performance metrics.
keyMethods: GetHighLowScore(page, userTypes) - Generates high/low score report
ExportToCSV(page) - Exports report data to CSV
files.migrationNote: Complex reporting with FusionCharts and Obout Grid UI. Would need modern charting library (Chart.js/D3) and grid component in React.

files.summary: Data entity for user information within the quiz context, containing user ID, email, name, role ID, and department ID with traditional get/set properties.
files.businessPurpose: DTO for user data used in quiz assignment and reporting.
files.migrationNote: Simple user DTO.

files.summary: Auto-generated SOAP web service proxy for the FileUploadComponent service, providing methods for file upload, download, folder management, and thumbnail operations.
files.businessPurpose: Provides file upload/download capabilities for quiz-related documents and media via a SOAP web service.
keyMethods: UploadFile(filePath, fileData, fileName) - Uploads a file
files.migrationNote: SOAP file upload service would be replaced by Azure Blob Storage or similar in Node.js.

directoryOverview: Business.Quiz is a comprehensive quiz/assessment management module totaling over 16,500 lines of code. It provides complete quiz lifecycle management including quiz template design with question banks organized by specialty and topic, quiz assignment creation and management with configurable time limits and passing criteria, the quiz-taking experience with timer management and auto-submission, and extensive statistical reporting (mean/median, item analysis, coefficient alpha, point-biserial correlation). The module supports on-call quiz integration, voluntary quizzes, quiz sharing between departments, Excel import of questions, and CSV export of reports. Key dependencies include WebForms Page objects, Obout Grid controls, FusionCharts, and the Security module for user management.
keyWorkflows: Quiz template creation with question bank management (specialty/topic organization)
Quiz assignment to users by department, rotation, PGY level, or user type
Timed quiz-taking experience with question-by-question navigation
Automatic grading and result display with pass/fail determination
Comprehensive statistical reporting (8+ report types with charts)
Email notifications for assignments, reminders, and failures
Quiz question import from Excel templates
